v1: Dawn upon this soul of mine;
Word of God, and inward light
Wake my spirit, clear my sight,
Wake my spirit, clear my sight.
v2: Glow within this heart of mine;
Perish self in Thy pure fire,
Perish self in Thy pure fire.
v3: Fill and nerve this will of mine;
Grant that may I strongly live,
v4: Still this restless heart of mine;
Speak to calm this tossing sea,
v5: Gladden Thou this heart of mine;
In the desert ways I sing,
